message.content:
There are several ways to get people to respect you, including:

1. Be honest and transparent: Always tell the truth and be open about your intentions, even if it's difficult. People will appreciate your honesty and candor.

2. Act with integrity: Maintain high moral standards in all aspects of your lifeâ€”both personal and professional.

3. Show empathy: Listen to others' concerns, value their input, and try to understand their perspective before responding or making decisions.

4. Communicate clearly: Speak confidently and thoughtfully when expressing opinions or providing feedback; avoid aggressive language that can intimidate or offend others.

5- Be reliable: Keep commitments you make; show up on time for meetings/appointments; complete tasks as promised without constant reminders.

6- Demonstrate competence in your field/workplace by continuing learning new things relevant to what you do

7- Treat everyone equally & fairly regardless of status - such treatment would promote collaboration among different employees working together toward common goals

8- Remain calm under pressure-being able handle stressful situations gracefully helps build trust between yourself & those around who may come rely on assistance during times need

9- Accept responsibility mistakes made instead trying shift blame-the ability admit error demonstrates maturity confidence character allows grow professionally personally through experience gained handling negative situations positively effectively
